message.content:
cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.ETM 

This paper deals with control and optimization of flexible loads in a smart grid system. The use of model predictive control (MPC) and optimization techniques suggests that it could belong to the cs.SY (Systems and Control) category. Additionally, the use of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques for load shaping and voltage control could also place it in the cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) categories. The paper also deals with the optimization of energy generation and distribution, which could place it in the cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) category. Finally, the paper deals with the control of power systems, which could place it in the cs.ETM (Emerging Technologies in Measurement) category.
